landing.title: High-Performance Trading Platform
landing.subtitle: A modern Vue + TypeScript frontend integrated with a FastAPI backend. Run backtests with CSV upload, configure Simple Moving Averages (SMA), and visualize your equity curve, PnL, and drawdown with Lightweight Charts.

legacy.text: Prefer the previous dashboard? Visit the legacy homepage.

simulation.title: Backtest Simulation
simulation.text: Upload your CSV price data, set SMA parameters, and run a server-powered backtest. Results show equity curve, PnL, and max drawdown with robust error handling and responsive UI.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.text: Register and login to store tokens in Pinia. Requests use an authenticated API client. For testing, the simulate page can be accessed without login.

visualization.title: Visualization
visualization.text: Equity curve rendered with Lightweight Charts. Metrics for PnL and drawdown with clear, minimal design.
